body: Hey! I'm doing an AMA! I know I'm not very well-known, so hopefully this can help. AMA, Go!
body_tagged: Hey! I'm doing an AMA! I know I'm not very well-known, so hopefully this can help. AMA, Go!
title: [AMA] _Mx_

replies.body:
Why "mx"?

Exactly how many people call you mix?
replies.body_tagged:
Why "mx"?

Exactly how many people call you mix?

replies.body:
Literally every American that I speak to verbally.

except you<3


And why Mx? Well, my first name is Matthew, which is why the M is there. Then X just sounds cool. My old user was mxbro ;)
replies.body_tagged:
Literally every American that I speak to verbally.

except you<3


And why Mx? Well, my first name is Matthew, which is why the M is there. Then X just sounds cool. My old user was mxbro ;)

Favourite food? 
Favourite fruit?

replies.body:
Favourite Food:

One time my family went to America and we had this thing called Cinnabon and now I'm in love and it's like forbidden love because we don't cinnamon rolls in NZ and I cry.


Favourite fruit:

Strawberries ;)


Favourite Drink:

This American creaming soda I had once (Americans make really good food & drink like what)


Favourite Colour:

Green/Black


Favourite Animal:

Pig ;3


Favourite Avicus Map:

I don't know many map names, but I enjoy that map where it's got iron and then ahead of it is gold blocks that you mine into enchant bottles. The teams are Red & Blue. Don't know the name.


Chocolate filled donut or donut filled chocolate:

YOU CAN GET THESE IN AMERICA?
